trans-unit.source: Represents a MIME protocol Content-Disposition header.
trans-unit.target: 表示 MIME 通訊協定內容配置標頭。

trans-unit.source: The information in the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition> class accompanies an email message that contains attachments when the email message is sent to its destination.
trans-unit.target: 中的資訊<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition>類別所附的電子郵件訊息傳送到目的地時，包含附件的電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: The information in <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition> can be used by software that displays email to present the email attachments in the manner intended by the sender.
trans-unit.target: 中的資訊<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition>可供顯示寄件者對象的方式呈現電子郵件附件的電子郵件的軟體。

trans-unit.source: Email messages are created using instances of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用的執行個體建立電子郵件訊息的<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>類別。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment> class are used to add attachments to email messages.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment>類別可用來將附件加入至電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: To modify the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition> for an attachment, get the instance from the <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment.ContentDisposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition>附件，取得執行個體從<xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment.ContentDisposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Content to be displayed as part of the message body has the disposition type of <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.Inline%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 內容會顯示隨訊息本文有配置類型的<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.Inline%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Content that is not displayed but is attached in a separate file has the disposition type of <xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Attachment>.
trans-unit.target: 不會顯示，但會附加在個別檔案的內容有配置類型的<xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Attachment>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.Inline%2A> property to control the disposition type for the attachment associated with an instance of <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.Inline%2A>屬性，即可控制附件的執行個體相關聯的配置類型<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition>。

trans-unit.source: For file attachments, you can use the properties of the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition> to set the file size, as well as the date the file was created, last read, and last modified.
trans-unit.target: 附加檔案，您可以使用的屬性<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition>若要設定的檔案大小，以及建立檔案的日期，上次讀取，以及上次修改。

trans-unit.source: For all attachments, you can set a recommended file name in the event that the attachment is stored on the receiving computer.
trans-unit.target: 所有附件，您可以設定建議使用的檔案名稱，將附件儲存在接收端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ToString%2A> method returns the Content-Disposition header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ToString%2A>方法傳回的內容配置標頭。

trans-unit.source: The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: Content-disposition 標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an email message with an attachment to be displayed inline.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例建立與要顯示的內嵌附件的電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> class with a <see cref="P:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.DispositionType" /> of <see cref="F:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Attachment" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.DispositionType" />，初始化 <see cref="F:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Attachment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The instance returned by this constructor has the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.DispositionType%2A> property set to <xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Attachment>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式所傳回的執行個體有<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.DispositionType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Attachment>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames" /> value that contains the disposition.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames" /> 值，包含配置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> class with the specified disposition information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的配置資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="disposition" /> is <see langword="null" /> or equal to <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="disposition" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或等於 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the creation date for a file attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案附件的建立日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that indicates the file creation date; otherwise, <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> if no date was specified.
trans-unit.target: 指出檔案建立日期的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值，但如果沒有指定日期，則為 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.CreationDate> property is used to send time stamp information with a file being sent in an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.CreationDate>屬性用來傳送電子郵件訊息中傳送的檔案時間戳記資訊。

trans-unit.source: This value sets the Creation-Date parameter in the Content-Disposition header sent with the email.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會設定傳送電子郵件的內容配置標頭中建立日期的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage> class is used to compose an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>類別用來撰寫電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment> class is used to attach a file to an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment>類別用來將檔案附加到電子郵件。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.CreationDate>, get the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition> for the attachment from the <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment.ContentDisposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.CreationDate>，取得<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition>從附件<xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment.ContentDisposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: Content-disposition 標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the disposition type for an email attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定電子郵件附件的配置類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the disposition type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含配置類型。

trans-unit.source: The value is not restricted but is typically one of the <see cref="P:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.DispositionType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 這個值沒有限制，但通常是其中一個 <see cref="P:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.DispositionType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.DispositionType%2A> property value can be used by software that displays email to determine the correct way to present the email attachments.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.DispositionType%2A>屬性值可供顯示判斷正確的方式來呈現電子郵件附件的電子郵件的軟體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Inline> attachments are usually displayed when the user opens the email.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Inline> 在使用者開啟電子郵件時，通常會顯示附件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Attachment> attachments are usually not opened until the user performs some action, such as clicking an icon that represents the attachment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Attachment> 直到使用者執行某些動作，例如，按一下圖示，代表附件，通常是未開啟附件。

trans-unit.source: The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: Content-disposition 標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 為設定作業指定的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is equal to <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> ("").
trans-unit.target: 為設定作業指定的值等於 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> object to compare with this object.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個物件比較的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the content-disposition header of the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> object is equal to the content-disposition header of this object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定之 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> 物件的內容配置標頭是否等於這個物件的內容配置標頭。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the content-disposition headers are the same; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容配置標頭相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the suggested file name for an email attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定電子郵件附件的建議檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the file name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.FileName%2A> property allows the sender to suggest the name to be used to store an email attachment on the recipient's computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.FileName%2A>屬性可讓寄件者，來建議要用來在收件者的電腦上儲存的電子郵件附件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This name is a suggestion only; the receiving system can ignore it.
trans-unit.target: 這個名稱是建議。接收端系統可以忽略它。

trans-unit.source: The name must not include path information; any such information is ignored by the receiving computer.
trans-unit.target: 名稱不得包含路徑資訊。接收端電腦會忽略任何這類資訊。

trans-unit.source: To remove file name information, you can set this property to `null` or the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的檔案名稱資訊，您可以將此屬性`null`或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: Content-disposition 標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines the hash code of the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> object
trans-unit.target: 決定指定之 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition" /> 物件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: An integer hash value.
trans-unit.target: 整數雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that determines the disposition type (Inline or Attachment) for an email attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，以判斷電子郵件附件的配置類型 (內嵌或附件)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if content in the attachment is presented inline as part of the email body; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果附件中的內容以內嵌方式呈現做為電子郵件本文的一部分否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.Inline%2A> property sets the disposition type in the Content-Disposition header sent with the email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.Inline%2A>屬性設定傳送電子郵件訊息的內容配置標頭中的配置類型。

trans-unit.source: The disposition type can be used by software that displays email to determine the correct way to present the email attachments.
trans-unit.target: 配置類型可供顯示判斷正確的方式來呈現電子郵件附件的電子郵件的軟體。

trans-unit.source: Attachments with a disposition type of <xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Inline?displayProperty=nameWithType> are usually displayed when the user opens the email.
trans-unit.target: 配置具有附件的型別<xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Inline?displayProperty=nameWithType>通常會顯示在使用者開啟電子郵件時。

trans-unit.source: Attachments with a disposition type of <xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Attachment?displayProperty=nameWithType> are usually not opened until the user performs some additional action, such as clicking an icon that represents the attachment.
trans-unit.target: 配置具有附件的型別<xref:System.Net.Mime.DispositionTypeNames.Attachment?displayProperty=nameWithType>通常不會開啟直到使用者執行某些其他動作，例如，按一下圖示，代表附件。

trans-unit.source: The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: Content-disposition 標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the modification date for a file attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案附件的修改日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that indicates the file modification date; otherwise, <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> if no date was specified.
trans-unit.target: 指出檔案修改日期的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值，但如果沒有指定日期，則為 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ModificationDate%2A> property is used to send time stamp information with a file being sent in an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ModificationDate%2A>屬性用來傳送電子郵件訊息中傳送的檔案時間戳記資訊。

trans-unit.source: This value sets the Modification-Date parameter in the Content-Disposition header sent with the email message.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會設定傳送電子郵件訊息的內容配置標頭中修改日期的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage> class is used to compose an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>類別用來撰寫電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment> class is used to attach a file to an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment>類別用來將檔案附加到電子郵件。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ModificationDate%2A> property, get the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition> for the attachment using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment.ContentDisposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ModificationDate%2A>屬性，取得<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition>附件使用<xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment.ContentDisposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: Content-disposition 標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters included in the Content-Disposition header represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含在這個執行個體所表示之內容配置標頭中的參數。

trans-unit.source: A writable <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary" /> that contains parameter name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 可寫入的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary" />，包含參數名稱/值組。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters are determined by the property values so you do not need to access them.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，參數取決於屬性值，您不需要存取它們。

trans-unit.source: If you need to add or change parameter information, modify the dictionary returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.Parameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要新增或變更參數資訊，請修改所傳回之字典<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.Parameters%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183, available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: RFC 2183，可在中描述之內容配置標頭[ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the parameters that are sent to the Content-Disposition header.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示傳送至 Content-disposition 標頭的參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the read date for a file attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案附件的讀取日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that indicates the file read date; otherwise, <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> if no date was specified.
trans-unit.target: 指出檔案讀取日期的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值，但如果沒有指定日期，則為 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ReadDate%2A> property is used to send time stamp information with a file being sent in an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ReadDate%2A>屬性用來傳送電子郵件訊息中傳送的檔案時間戳記資訊。

trans-unit.source: This value sets the Read-Date parameter in the Content-Disposition header sent with the email message.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會設定傳送電子郵件訊息的內容配置標頭中讀取日期的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage> class is used to compose an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>類別用來撰寫電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment> class is used to attach a file to an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment>類別用來將檔案附加到電子郵件。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ReadDate%2A>, get the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition> for the attachment by using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment.ContentDisposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ReadDate%2A>，取得<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition>使用附件<xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment.ContentDisposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: Content-disposition 標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of a file attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案附件的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that specifies the number of bytes in the file attachment.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，其指定檔案附件中的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that the file size is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示檔案大小未知。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.Size%2A> property is used to send time stamp information with a file being sent in an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.Size%2A>屬性用來傳送電子郵件訊息中傳送的檔案時間戳記資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage> class is used to compose the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>類別用來撰寫訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment> class is used to attach a file to an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.Attachment>類別用來將檔案附加到電子郵件。

trans-unit.source: The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: Content-disposition 標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to get this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the property values for this instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含這個執行個體的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ToString%2A> method is the Content-Disposition header.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的字串<xref:System.Net.Mime.ContentDisposition.ToString%2A>方法是 Content-disposition 標頭。

trans-unit.source: The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: Content-disposition 標頭所述在 RFC 2183 [ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。
